Location:
- Exterior HVAC condensing unit (side panel)

Observations:
- Gray metal cabinet with manufacturer safety label (R-410A refrigerant noted)
- Label intact and legible
- Light scuffs/scratches on painted surface
- Vegetation/debris visible adjacent to unit

Potential Issues:
- Minor surface rust spotting on cabinet finish (beginning corrosion)
- Vegetation in close proximity may restrict airflow and invite pests

Recommendations:
- Remove/trim vegetation and debris; maintain clear airflow clearance around unit
- Clean, treat, and repaint rust spots with exterior-rated coating; monitor for spread
- Continue routine service/inspection per manufacturer guidelines
